Taxi - Class in taxi.model
The Taxi class implements all taxis using the taxi service.
Taxi() - Constructor for class taxi.model.Taxi
The default constructor
Taxi(String, String, String, String, double, double) - Constructor for class taxi.model.Taxi
The main constructor The status of the Taxi is always true (free) at the beginning.
taxi.model - package taxi.model
 
taxi.utils - package taxi.utils
 
TaxiDriver - Class in taxi.model
The Customer TaxiDriver implements all taxi drivers using the taxi service.
TaxiDriver() - Constructor for class taxi.model.TaxiDriver
The default constructor
TaxiDriver(String, String, String, String, String, Date, String, String, int, String, String, String, String, String, Taxi) - Constructor for class taxi.model.TaxiDriver
The main constructor
taxiDriverAddress(TaxiDriverInfo, long) - Method in class taxi.resource.EditAccountResource
taxiDriverAddress method receives PUT requests at path /editaccount/TaxiDriverAddress/x where x = numeric taxi driver ID It is called when a taxi driver needs to change his address This method receives as input JSON (includes the new address).
taxiDriverCreditCard(TaxiDriverInfo, long) - Method in class taxi.resource.EditAccountResource
taxiDriverCreditCard method receives PUT requests at path /editaccount/TaxiDriverCreditCard/x where x = numeric taxi driver ID It is called when a taxi driver needs to change his credit card's info This method receives as input JSON (includes the new credit card).
taxiDriverEmail(TaxiDriverInfo, long) - Method in class taxi.resource.EditAccountResource
taxiDriverEmail method receives PUT requests at path /editaccount/TaxiDriverEmail/x where x = numeric taxi driver ID It is called when a taxi driver needs to change his email This method receives as input JSON (includes the new email).
TaxiDriverInfo - Class in taxi.resource
The TaxiDriverInfo class implements the xml representation of a TaxiDriver, needed from EditAccountResource Every TaxiDriverInfo has: id, name, surname, sex, username, dateOfBirth, address, city, zipCode, email, creditCardType, creditCardNumber, expiryDate, ccv
TaxiDriverInfo() - Constructor for class taxi.resource.TaxiDriverInfo
Default constructor
TaxiDriverInfo(long, String, String, String, String, Date, String, String, int, String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class taxi.resource.TaxiDriverInfo
This constructor is used when the id of the object is known
TaxiDriverInfo(String, String, String, String, Date, String, String, int, String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class taxi.resource.TaxiDriverInfo
This constructor is used when the id in unknown
TaxiDriverInfo(TaxiDriver) - Constructor for class taxi.resource.TaxiDriverInfo
This constructor creates a TaxiDriverInfo object from a TaxiDriver object
taxiDriverLogin(LoginInfo) - Method in class taxi.resource.LoginResource
taxiDriverLogin method receives POST requests at path /login/TaxiDriverLogin This method receives as input JSON.
TaxiInfo - Class in taxi.resource
The TaxiInfo class implements the xml representation of a taxi and taxi driver, needed from RegistrationResource Every TaxiInfo has: name, surname, sex, username, password, dateOfBirth, address, city, zipCode, email, creditCardType, creditCardNumber, expiryDate, ccv, carModel carType licensePlate carModelDate locationLat, locationLon,
TaxiInfo() - Constructor for class taxi.resource.TaxiInfo
Default constructor
TaxiInfo(String, String, String, String, String, Date, String, String, int, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, double, double) - Constructor for class taxi.resource.TaxiInfo
The main constructor
